contentrichtext.text: '''Tsushima Subprefecture''' (対馬支庁, ''Tsushima-shichō'', {{coord|34.210417|129.289833|format=dms|display=inline,title|type:landmark_region:JP_scale:10000}}) is an administrative subdivision of [[Nagasaki Prefecture]], [[Japan]]. This [[Subprefectures of Japan|subprefecture]] is the administrative body for the [[Tsushima Island]] which lie between [[Kyūshū]] and the [[Korean Peninsula]]. The only municipality in ''Tsushima Subprefecture'' is [[Tsushima, Nagasaki|Tsushima City]], which itself is the composite of a recent [[List of mergers in Nagasaki Prefecture|town merger]] of six smaller towns on the island. ==Former Districts and towns== *[[Kamiagata District, Nagasaki|Kamiagata]] **[[Kamiagata, Nagasaki|Kami-agata]] **[[Kamitsushima, Nagasaki|Kami-tsushima]] **[[Mine, Nagasaki|Mine]] *[[Shimoagata District, Nagasaki|Shimoagata]] **[[Izuhara, Nagasaki|Izuhara]] **[[Mitsushima, Nagasaki|Mitsushima]] **[[Toyotama, Nagasaki|Toyotama]] {{Nagasaki}} ==External links== [[Category:Subprefectures in Nagasaki Prefecture]] {{Nagasaki-geo-stub}}
